statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT training_topic FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 2
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT trainer_name FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 3
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_topic = 'Sales Training'
SELECT employee_id, training_topic FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 4 AND training_topic = 'Leadership Development'
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trainings FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT AVG(employee_id) AS average_employee_id FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT MAX(employee_id) AS max_employee_id FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT MIN(employee_id) AS min_employee_id FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT SUM(employee_id) AS total_employee_id FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT trainer_name) AS unique_trainers FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords ORDER BY training_date DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords ORDER BY employee_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_topic LIKE '%Development%'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_date > '2022-09-01'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 5 OR employee_id = 6
SELECT employee_id, training_topic FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY training_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT trainer_name FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_topic='HR Policy' AND training_date > '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM Employees WHERE department='IT')
SELECT training_topic, COUNT(*) AS training_count FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords GROUP BY training_topic
SELECT employee_id, training_date, trainer_name FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_topic='Safety Training' ORDER BY training_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, MAX(training_date) AS last_training_date FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, trainer_name FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE trainer_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE trainer_name IN ('John Doe', 'Jane Smith')

SELECT AVG(t1.training_date - t2.training_date) AS avg_training_gap FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords t1 JOIN EmployeeTrainingRecords t2 ON t1.employee_id = t2.employee_id AND t1.training_date > t2.training_date
SELECT employee_id, training_topic FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_topic LIKE '%Soft Skills%' ORDER BY training_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT training_topic, COUNT(DISTINCT trainer_name) AS unique_trainers FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords GROUP BY training_topic
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS training_count FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_date = (SELECT MAX(training_date) FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords)
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, DATEDIFF(NOW(), training_date) AS days_since_training FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT DISTINCT training_topic, DATE_FORMAT(training_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords ORDER BY formatted_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trainings, training_topic, trainer_name FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords GROUP BY training_topic, trainer_name
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, IF(trainer_name IS NULL, 'No Trainer', trainer_name) AS trainer_status FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), training_date)) AS avg_days_since_training FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, training_date FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE DATE(training_date) = CURDATE()
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, trainer_name FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE YEAR(training_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(training_date) = MONTH(CURDATE())
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees;
SELECT id, position FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT record_id, employee_id FROM training_records;
SELECT training_date, training_type FROM training_records;
SELECT employee_id, completion_status FROM training_records;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE completion_status='completed';
SELECT training_date, training_type FROM training_records WHERE training_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.id = training_records.employee_id;
SELECT employees.name, training_records.training_type FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.id = training_records.employee_id;
SELECT employees.*, training_records.training_date FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.id = training_records.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='Marketing' AND position='Manager';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT' OR department='HR';
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE completion_status='pending' OR completion_status='in progress';
SELECT name AS employee_name, department AS emp_dept FROM employees;
SELECT id, position, CONCAT(name, ' - ', department) AS emp_info FROM employees;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, MIN(id) AS min_id, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM employees;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, MIN(id) AS min_id, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM employees OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM employees LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='Finance' AND position='Manager';
SELECT name FROM employees WHERE position='Intern' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT e.name, t.training_date FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id WHERE t.training_type = 'Safety Training';
SELECT e.name, t.training_type FROM employees e LEFT JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id WHERE t.employee_id IS NULL;
SELECT e.name, t.training_date, t.completion_status FROM employees e INNER JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id WHERE t.completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT e.name, COUNT(t.record_id) AS num_trainings FROM employees e LEFT JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id GROUP BY e.name HAVING num_trainings > 3;
SELECT e.name, SUM(CASE WHEN t.completion_status = 'Completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_completed_trainings FROM employees e INNER JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT department, AVG(CASE WHEN position = 'Manager' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS manager_avg FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT department, training_type, COUNT(*) AS num_trainings FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id GROUP BY department, training_type;
SELECT department, MAX(t.training_date) AS latest_training_date FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id GROUP BY department;
SELECT e.name, t.training_date, MIN(t.training_date) OVER(PARTITION BY e.id) AS earliest_training_date FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY t.training_date DESC) AS training_rank FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id;
SELECT department, AVG(CASE WHEN completion_status = 'Completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completion_rate FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id GROUP BY department;
SELECT department, completion_status, COUNT(*) AS num_trainings FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id GROUP BY department, completion_status;

SELECT department, training_type, AVG(CASE WHEN completion_status = 'Completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completion_rate FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id GROUP BY department, training_type;

SELECT department, training_date, completion_status, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY department ORDER BY training_date DESC) AS training_row_number FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, t.training_type, LEAD(t.training_date) OVER(ORDER BY t.training_date) AS next_training_date FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.id = t.employee_id;
SELECT department, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, t.training_date)) AS avg_days_since_training FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT training_course, completion_date FROM training_records;
SELECT employee_id, training_course, completion_date FROM training_records;
SELECT * FROM departments;
SELECT department_name FROM departments;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department='Accounting';
SELECT employee_id, training_course FROM training_records WHERE completion_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id=1;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_records ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id=5;
SELECT employee_id, training_course FROM training_records WHERE employee_id=10;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Eng%';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department IN ('IT', 'Marketing');
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) FROM employees GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT department_name, AVG(employee_id) FROM employees GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE completion_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE first_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM employees INNER JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id
SELECT employee_id, first_name, training_course, completion_date FROM employees INNER JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE department = 'Finance'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = (SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id = 2)
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing')
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees UNION SELECT employee_id, training_course, completion_date FROM training_records WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY employee_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 5

SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, training_course, completion_date FROM employees LEFT JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE training_course IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department LIKE '%Eng%'
SELECT first_name, last_name, department_name FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name WHERE department_id > 1
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('IT', 'HR', 'Accounting')
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 1001 AND 1010
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department <> 'Management'
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_course LIKE '%SQL%'
SELECT employee_id, MAX(completion_date) AS latest_completion_date FROM training_records GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM training_courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM training_courses;
SELECT course_id, course_duration FROM training_courses;
SELECT * FROM employee_training;
SELECT employee_id, course_id, training_date FROM employee_training;
SELECT training_id, completed FROM employee_training;
SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT training_id, completion_date, score FROM training_records;
SELECT record_id FROM training_records;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name FROM training_courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_training WHERE completed = true;
SELECT employee_id FROM employee_training WHERE course_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE score > 80;
SELECT completion_date FROM training_records WHERE training_id = 456;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM training_courses WHERE course_duration < 5;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND hire_date < '2018-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM training_courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM training_courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM training_courses WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM training_courses WHERE course_description LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT * FROM employee_training;
SELECT employee_id, course_id FROM employee_training WHERE training_date > '2019-01-01';
SELECT training_id, employee_id, completed FROM employee_training WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT training_id, completion_date FROM training_records WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT record_id, training_id, score FROM training_records WHERE completion_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT training_id, completion_date, score FROM training_records WHERE record_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT employee_name, course_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_courses tc ON et.course_id = tc.course_id WHERE et.training_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs;
SELECT employee_id, program_id, completion_date FROM employee_training WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT category_name FROM training_categories;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, t.program_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_programs t ON et.program_id = t.program_id;
SELECT program_name, trainer FROM training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees;
SELECT program_id, COUNT(*) AS total_enrollments FROM employee_training GROUP BY program_id;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_categories FROM training_program_categories GROUP BY program_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, tp.program_name FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id LEFT JOIN training_programs tp ON et.program_id = tp.program_id;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM training_categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, trainer FROM training_programs WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT DISTINCT program_id FROM employee_training;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM training_programs;

SELECT e.department, AVG(DATEDIFF(et.completion_date, tp.start_date)) AS avg_completion_time FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_programs tp ON et.program_id = tp.program_id GROUP BY e.department;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, tc.category_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_program_categories tpc ON et.program_id = tpc.program_id JOIN training_categories tc ON tpc.category_id = tc.category_id;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_enrollments FROM employee_training GROUP BY program_id HAVING total_enrollments > 5;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_enrollments FROM employee_training GROUP BY program_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_enrollments DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, trainer FROM training_programs WHERE trainer = 'John Doe';

SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, tp.program_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_programs tp ON et.program_id = tp.program_id;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, tc.category_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_programs tp ON et.program_id = tp.program_id JOIN training_program_categories tpc ON tp.program_id = tpc.program_id JOIN training_categories tc ON tpc.category_id = tc.category_id WHERE e.department = 'IT';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_programs, trainer FROM training_programs GROUP BY trainer;
SELECT program_id, program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM training_programs tp JOIN employee_training et ON tp.program_id = et.program_id GROUP BY program_id;

SELECT program_name, category_name FROM training_programs tp JOIN training_program_categories tpc ON tp.program_id = tpc.program_id JOIN training_categories tc ON tpc.category_id = tc.category_id WHERE tp.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_programs FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id GROUP BY e.first_name, e.last_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(et.completion_date, et.program_id)) AS avg_days_to_complete FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id GROUP BY e.first_name, e.last_name HAVING AVG(DATEDIFF(et.completion_date, et.program_id)) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT trainer FROM training_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, SUM(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS total_duration_days FROM training_programs GROUP BY program_name, start_date, end_date;
SELECT program_name, trainer, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM training_programs tp JOIN employee_training et ON tp.program_id = et.program_id GROUP BY program_name, trainer HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, tp.program_name, DATEDIFF(et.completion_date, tp.start_date) AS days_to_complete FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_programs tp ON et.program_id = tp.program_id WHERE e.department = 'Finance';
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_categories FROM training_programs tp JOIN training_program_categories tpc ON tp.program_id = tpc.program_id GROUP BY program_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, tc.category_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_programs tp ON et.program_id = tp.program_id JOIN training_program_categories tpc ON tp.program_id = tpc.program_id JOIN training_categories tc ON tpc.category_id = tc.category_id WHERE e.department = 'Sales';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, trainer FROM training_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_programs FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id GROUP BY e.first_name, e.last_name HAVING COUNT(*) = 1;

SELECT program_name, category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_programs FROM training_programs tp JOIN training_program_categories tpc ON tp.program_id = tpc.program_id JOIN training_categories tc ON tpc.category_id = tc.category_id GROUP BY program_name, category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
